channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Naturepedic Promo Codes and Deals: 20% Off
item.description: Save on Naturepedic’s line of organic, thoughtfully crafted mattresses and bedding with our coupon codes for this month.

item.title: Newegg Promo Code: 10% Off in September 2025
item.description: Enjoy up to 10% off your entire order with today’s Newegg discount code and save with the latest deals for gaming PCs, laptops, and computer parts.

item.title: Dyson Promo Codes: 20% Off | September 2025
item.description: Get 20% off with a Dyson coupon code, plus save up to $200 on vacuums, Airwraps, and more.

item.title: HP Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 60% Off | September 2025
item.description: Save up to 60%, plus an extra 20% with HP promo codes for laptops, printers, PCs, and more tech.

item.title: 40% Home Depot Promo Codes & Coupons | September 2025
item.description: Save 10%, plus up to 40% with the latest Home Depot promo code and coupons for patio furniture, appliances, and power tools with verified discounts fo...

item.title: Anthropic users face a new choice – opt out or share your chats for AI training
item.description: Anthropic is making some major changes to how it handles user data. Users have until September 28 to take action.

item.title: AI or not, Will Smith’s crowd video is fresh cringe
item.description: Fans accused Will Smith of sharing AI-generated videos from his tour, but the situation is more complicated than it seems.

item.title: Trump administration’s deal is structured to prevent Intel from selling foundry unit
item.description: The deal allows the U.S. to take more equity in Intel if the company doesn't retain at least 51% ownership in its foundry business.

item.title: Mississippi’s age assurance law puts decentralized social networks to the test
item.description: Bluesky says it would block access to its service in the state of Mississippi, rather than comply with the new age verification law.

item.title: Nvidia, Google, and Bill Gates help Commonwealth Fusion Systems raise $863M
item.description: Commonwealth Fusion Systems has raised nearly $3 billion to commercialize its fusion power plant. It hopes to send electricity to the grid in the earl...
